accounts.description: (Optional) Specifies the list of accounts a report covers.

frameworkArns.description: ARNs of the frameworks a report covers.

numberOfFrameworks.description: Specifies the number of frameworks a report covers.

organizationUnits.description: (Optional) Specifies the list of Organizational Units a report covers.

regions.description: (Optional) Specifies the list of regions a report covers.

reportTemplate.description: Identifies the report template for the report. Reports are built using a report template.
